"HO! HO! HOEY" (Surfdog/Zoo). The guitar soloist Gary Hoey distrustfully plays songs made famous by others: he gets inside them, creates his own structure and style and doesn't let a familiar melody determine the net worth of a piece of music. That's what turns his album of instrumental versions of Christmas classics from a dubious idea into a good Christmas soundtrack for rock fans tired of hearing the same old songs played in the same old way. Highlights include a slow, atmospheric "Silent Night" and a heavy-metal "The 12 Days of Christmas."
